segments.text: Ugh, this kitchen is a disgusting mess right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's gushing from the sink, soaking everything in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor looks filthy, spreading across the tiles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman's foot is in it, and she doesn't even flinch—gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are climbing around, probably tracking that water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's hand deep in the cookie jar after touching who knows what.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's wobbling in the wet spot; imagine the germs.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's just standing there, hand out, ready to grab a soggy cookie maybe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streaming down the cabinets—it's all going to mold or something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dish towel she's using might be damp from the splash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the pretty garden view can't hide this indoor disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how sloppy and unclean it all seems.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those open cabinets are just inviting dust and water damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene turns my stomach.
segments.speaker: PAR
